subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Johnson Wagner got lucky bounces on two tee shots and shot a three-under-par 69 on Saturday for a one-shot lead over Chad Campbell after the third round of the PGA’s Houston Open in Humble, Tex. Wagner, winless in 43 career starts, had a 15-under 201 total. Charley Hoffman and Bob Estes were three shots behind.
